    Ordered groups #

    This file develops the basics of ordered groups.

    Implementation details #

    Unfortunately, the number of ' appended to lemmas in this file may differ between the multiplicative and the additive version of a lemma. The reason is that we did not want to change existing names in the library.

    source
    class OrderedAddCommGroup (Î± : Type u) extends AddCommGroup , PartialOrder :
    Type u

    An ordered additive commutative group is an additive commutative group with a partial order in which addition is strictly monotone.

    • add : Î± â Î± â Î±
    • add_assoc : â (a b c : Î±), a + b + c = a + (b + c)
    • zero : Î±
    • zero_add : â (a : Î±), 0 + a = a
    • add_zero : â (a : Î±), a + 0 = a
    • nsmul : â â Î± â Î±
    • nsmul_zero : â (x : Î±), AddMonoid.nsmul 0 x = 0
    • nsmul_succ : â (n : â) (x : Î±), AddMonoid.nsmul (n + 1) x = x + AddMonoid.nsmul n x
    • neg : Î± â Î±
    • sub : Î± â Î± â Î±
    • sub_eq_add_neg : â (a b : Î±), a - b = a + -b
    • zsmul : â¤ â Î± â Î±
    • zsmul_zero' : â (a : Î±), SubNegMonoid.zsmul 0 a = 0
    • zsmul_succ' : â (n : â) (a : Î±), SubNegMonoid.zsmul (Int.ofNat (Nat.succ n)) a = a + SubNegMonoid.zsmul (Int.ofNat n) a
    • zsmul_neg' : â (n : â) (a : Î±), SubNegMonoid.zsmul (Int.negSucc n) a = -SubNegMonoid.zsmul (â(Nat.succ n)) a
    • add_left_neg : â (a : Î±), -a + a = 0
    • add_comm : â (a b : Î±), a + b = b + a
    • le : Î± â Î± â Prop
    • lt : Î± â Î± â Prop
    • le_refl : â (a : Î±), a â¤ a
    • le_trans : â (a b c : Î±), a â¤ b â b â¤ c â a â¤ c
    • lt_iff_le_not_le : â (a b : Î±), a < b â a â¤ b â§ Â¬b â¤ a
    • le_antisymm : â (a b : Î±), a â¤ b â b â¤ a â a = b
    • add_le_add_left : â (a b : Î±), a â¤ b â â (c : Î±), c + a â¤ c + b

      Addition is monotone in an ordered additive commutative group.
